Selected Publications:
1. Stokes JB. Sodium and potassium transport across the cortical and outer medullary collecting tubule of the rabbit: evidence for diffusion across the outer medullary portion. Am J Physiol 242 (Renal Fluid Electrolyte Physiol 11) : F514-F520, 1982.
2. Stokes JB. Consequences of potassium recycling in the renal medulla. Effect on ion transport by the medullary thick ascending limb of Henle's loop. J Clin Invest 70:219-229, 1982.
3. Stokes JB. Ion transport by the cortical and outer medullary collecting tubule. Kidney Int 22:473-484, 1982.
4. Stokes JB. NaCl absorption by the urinary bladder of the winter flounder: a thiazide-sensitive, electrically neutral transport system. J Clin Invest 74:7-16, 1984.
5. Stokes JB. Pathways of K' permeation across the rabbit cortical collecting tubule: effect of amiloride. Am J Physiol 246 (Renal Fluid Electrolyte Physiol 15) : F457-F466, 1984.
6. Stokes JE. Cellular K' permeation across the cortical collecting tubule: effects of Na -K pump inhibition and membrane depolarization. Am J Physiol 246(Renal Fluid Electrolyte Physiol 15) : F467-F475, 1984.
